title: Susan Boyle Feels Happy About Actor's Kind Words
summary: Susan Boyle, a singer from Scotland, was very happy when a famous actor named Timothée Chalamet said nice things about her. He called her one of his biggest British heroes. This happened because she sang a song on a TV show called Britain's Got Talent in 2009, and many people loved it. Susan said she felt flattered and humble. She thinks everyone should have big dreams. Timothée was talking about this while promoting his new movie. He also gave jackets to other famous people he admires. Susan became famous when she was on the show, and Timothée was 13 years old at that time. He still remembers her performance well.

background_read: Susan Boyle is a singer from Scotland who became famous in 2009 after singing on Britain's Got Talent. Her performance surprised many people because she had a beautiful voice. Timothée Chalamet is a young actor from America who stars in movies. He was talking about his favorite British heroes for a news interview. This article shows how kind words can make people feel happy and inspired.
